alice.tuprolog

Class ClauseStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • alice.tuprolog.ClauseStore

  • public class ClauseStore
extends java.lang.Object
    A list of clauses belonging to the same family as a goal. A family is composed by clauses with the same functor and arity.

      • checkCompatibility

        private boolean checkCompatibility(Term goal)
        Verify if a clause exists that is compatible with goal. As a side effect, clauses that are not compatible get discarded from the currently examined family.
        Parameters:
        goal -
